Portsmouth Cycle Forum

Portsmouth Cycle Forum is a group for anyone who cycles, or wants to cycle, in and around Portsmouth UK.

PCF Committee Meeting - July 2013

Tuesday 2 July 2013
1 min

] PCF Committee Meeting

The next PCF committee meeting will be held on Friday 5th July at 6pm.  If you have any suggestions for what should be discussed please let us know.

The minutes of our last meeting are here: PCF Committee Meeting Minutes June 2013
